choices: A run of the mill office Job
A up and coming Modeling Agency
1.content:
Where would you like the setting of the story to generally take place and begin? Whichever place you chose should have the majority of the focus that route

Office Job: Sho works in a very generic simple office job, with no real excitement up until he gets his powers

Modeling Agency: Sho works as a Job Recruiter in a new modeling agency with a promising future, with a vast array of options once you get your powers

Summer camp: Sho can either be a supervisor or a camper himself in a secluded part of the northwest woods

University Student: Sho is a student at a well-known university, with a huge student body, it can be daunting,but with your powers University might even be a cake-walk
1.title: Where do we start?

info.brief_description: A man gets the power to possess people in different settings
info.description:
An Interactive Story where the main character, a young adult named Sho(a generic self insert for the reader) is given the power to mind control and possess people in various settings

Rules:
No gore
No abrupt ends

Also you can chose to explain the powers in world or not, it is entirely up to you

Because the story can take place in various settings I am not going to list characters here, as it will be up to you on where to add and what to expand, but please give a general description of the character so they can be added to this page once in the story
